LanguageData.Electricity.label: electricity
LanguageData.Electricity.description: Harness the power of electricity for a hundred different tasks.
LanguageData.Batteries.label: battery
LanguageData.BiofuelRefining.label: biofuel refining
LanguageData.BiofuelRefining.description: Build biofuel refineries to make chemfuel from biological matter like wood or foodstuffs.
LanguageData.Waterproofing.label: waterproof conduit
LanguageData.NutrientPaste.label: nutrient paste
LanguageData.NutrientPaste.description: Build nutrient paste dispensers which efficiently produce edible meals from raw nutritive feedstocks, while requiring no labor at all.
LanguageData.SolarPanels.label: solar panel
LanguageData.SolarPanels.description: Build solar panels for electricity generation.
LanguageData.AirConditioning.label: air conditioning
LanguageData.AirConditioning.description: Build coolers to make people comfortable in hot weather, or to construct freezers for storing perishable goods.
LanguageData.Autodoors.label: autodoor
LanguageData.Autodoors.description: Build autodoors which automatically open when someone approaches, without slowing anyone down.
LanguageData.Hydroponics.label: hydroponics
LanguageData.Hydroponics.description: Build hydroponics basins to rapidly grow crops indoors regardless of the terrain or weather outside.
LanguageData.ElectricSmelting.label: electric smelting
LanguageData.ElectricSmelting.description: Build electric smithy and smelters.\n\nThe electric smithy allows smithing items without fuel. The electric smelter extracts useful metal from slag chunks and other items.
LanguageData.TubeTelevision.label: tube television
LanguageData.TubeTelevision.description: Produce tube televisions for recreational watching.
LanguageData.PackagedSurvivalMeal.label: packaged survival meal
LanguageData.PackagedSurvivalMeal.description: Produce packaged survival meals which never go bad. Great for traveling.
LanguageData.ElectricCremation.label: electric cremation
LanguageData.ElectricCremation.description: Build crematoriums for vaporizing unwanted corpses.
LanguageData.Firefoam.label: firefoam
LanguageData.Firefoam.description: Construct firefoam poppers, automatic fire-safety devices which spread fire-retardant foam in response to encroaching flames.
LanguageData.IEDs.label: IEDs
LanguageData.IEDs.description: Build improvised traps from any kind of mortar shell.
LanguageData.GeothermalPower.label: geothermal power
LanguageData.GeothermalPower.description: Build geothermal power plants on top of steam geysers, for uninterrupted power.
LanguageData.SterileMaterials.label: sterile materials
LanguageData.SterileMaterials.description: Construct sterile tiles to make cleanrooms for safer and more effective medical treatment, research, and cooking.
LanguageData.Machining.label: machining
LanguageData.Machining.description: Build machining tables to craft guns, grenades, flak armor, and to disassemble dead mechanoids for resources.
LanguageData.SmokepopBelt.label: smokepop belts
LanguageData.SmokepopBelt.description: Build smokepop belts which generate an automatic defensive smokescreen when the user is shot.
LanguageData.Prosthetics.label: prosthetics
LanguageData.Prosthetics.description: Build inexpensive prosthetic body parts to replace lost limbs. Requires a skilled doctor to attach.
LanguageData.Gunsmithing.label: gunsmithing
LanguageData.Gunsmithing.description: Craft simple manually-operated guns like revolvers, pump shotguns, bolt-action rifles, and incendiary launchers.
LanguageData.FlakArmor.label: flak armor
LanguageData.FlakArmor.description: Craft clothing with metal armor sewn in to resist bullets and explosions. This weighty armor slows movement slightly.
LanguageData.Mortars.label: mortars
LanguageData.Mortars.description: Build mortars which can lob shells long distances - even over walls.
LanguageData.BlowbackOperation.label: blowback operation
LanguageData.BlowbackOperation.description: Craft low-power blowback-operated guns like autopistols, machine pistols, and heavy SMGs.
LanguageData.GasOperation.label: gas operation
LanguageData.GasOperation.description: Craft high-power guns like chain shotguns and LMGs.
LanguageData.GunTurrets.label: gun turrets
